TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EnumerableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class EnumerableRowCollection Implements IEnumerable
public ref class EnumerableRowCollection abstract : System::Collections::IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示從 LINQ to DataSet 查詢所傳回之 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects returned from a LINQ to DataSet query.

summary.span: 這個 API 支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不適合直接從您的程式碼中使用。

span.span: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的進入點，以便對轉換運算可以攔截內的擴充方法。 provides an entry point so that the cast operation can be intercepted within an extension method. 在衍生的泛型類別實際上由.NET Framework 用來包含查詢的結果。The derived generic class is actually used by the .NET Framework to contain the results of a query. 無法執行個體化這個類別。This class cannot be instantiated.

summary.span: 傳回 物件集合的列舉值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `null`。The default implementation always returns `null`.
